fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE OF PHAM BA TRUNG THANH 
I am a full stack developer with 4 years of experience in
PHP language and Front-End Web Development. 
I have good knowledge in Laravel Framework, MVC
Design, Repository Pattern, Agile and Scrum, Git, TestCase,
API, Javascript ES6. 
I like learning new technologies and finding clever ways to
solve problems. I am a good team player, I can also do some
mentoring tasks and do code reviews for other team members. 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
●
Name: Pham Ba Trung Thanh. 
●
Address: No. 411 C6B – Quynh Mai – Hai Ba Trung – Ha Noi. 
●
Cell phone: 0852773450 
●
Email: phambatrungthanh@gmail.com 
●
Date of Birth: 09/01/1992 
●
Place of Birth: Ho Chi Minh City 
●
Citizenship: Vietnam 
●
Marital Status: Single 
●
Sex: Male 
CAREER TARGET 
I would like to find a stable job with good income and good working environment. I expect to contribute
to the development of the company as well as promoted to higher position in the near future. 
EDUCATION 
●
University: Ha Noi University of Business and Technology (2015-2019). 
SKILL 
●
Programing skills:  
o
5+ years of experience in PHP. 
o
4+ years of experience in Front-end Development. 
o
Good knowledge in Laravel Framework, MVC Design, Repository Pattern, Agile and 
Scrum, Git, TestCase, API, Javascript ES6. 
English skills: Advance level of General English and Conversation. 
Teamwork skills from social activities taken part in the past.  
Mentor skills: 1 year mentoring a junior in a team. 
●
●
●
PERSONALITY AND INTEREST 
●
Enthusiastic, open minded, caring and resourceful, optimistic, having a good sense of humor and
get on easily with people of all ages and backgrounds. 
●
Always punctual and responsible when doing anything; really serious in work. 
●
Interested in reading books. 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
MEC International — Senior Software Developers 
Aug  2017 - Now 
Leader of an inhouse development team, making a management software closely follow the company’s 
workflow. 
●
Design architecture of the project. 
●
Design key components of the project. 
●
Collaborate with Project Owner to define objectives, product features, make scrum sprints, assign 
tasks and review pull request. 
●
Evaluated team member with OKRs and KPI. 
About the project: 
MEC's Business Management Software is an internal software specially created to match the company's 
workflow, speed-up the processes, manage resources,increase employee's performance and give managers a 
broader and clearer  image of every aspect in the company. It includes HRM Module, Project Module, 
Partner-Contact Module, Resources Module, Order-Invoice-Payment Module, Marketing Module, Operation 
Module.. 
Self-Employed — Freelancer 
Aug  2015 - Jun 2017 
Working as a freelancer, mostly about making e-commerce website, writing custom wordpress plugins, 
designing brochures, posters, etc… 
Featured Project: 
●
[Wordpress plugin] Nhanh.vn Bridge: A bridge between woocommerce and nhanh.vn API, sync 
update on stocks, prices, sales to woocommerce’s products, calculate shipping fee, order tracking. 
●
[Project] Ăn Gì Đây?: A web app that provides food suggestions based on user location and time of 
day, search for food  and live direction with map. 
●
[E-commerce]: pukido.com, jessiesbeautystore.com, chobuonsi.vn 
I do solemnly confirm that the above mentioned information is truly and look forward to your contact
soon. 
Best regards 
Pham Ba Trung Thanh
